name: LeafiHome
0:
”Alexa, open the bedroom window blinds.”
”Alexa, close the bedroom window blinds.”
”Alexa, open the kitchen window blinds to sixty percent.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Control your blinds with Nova by Leafi using Alexa! Just say "Alexa, open the bedroom window blinds" to let natural light in, or "Alexa, close the bedroom window blinds " to create a cozy atmosphere. Want precise control? Say "Alexa, open the bedroom window blinds to 60%" to set your blinds to the exact position you desire.
